english.segment1: I spread my minds wings and arise towards the sky. I fulfil all my dreams and to the essence of winter I fly..
english.segment2: To finest of weathers my wings are taking me. Caress of moon at frozen fields. Snowflakes floating down, forest of snowbound. Stars give everything a shine.
english.segment3: Now it's time to rest my mind at this Divine Wintertime. It's time to rest your mind at this Divine Wintertime. Winter.. Into the nature's eyes I stare now and feel 'em staring back. This unity sets me free. My quest for divinity has lead me here and here I'll stay. Loving embrace of God.
english.segment4: Now it's time to rest my mind at this Divine Wintertime. It's time to rest your mind at this Divine Wintertime.
